channel.title: minions on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in minions on Game6r

item.title: Game book minions
item.description: If you like coloring pictures, then you will definitely like this game. In it you will find many black and white images dedicated to minions. Choose any picture and start coloring it. To do this, you will have different colors at your disposal. Dip the brush in the color you like and create.

item.title: Minions New York game
item.description: In this game, you are invited to help the minion go on a journey. First, choose the look of his suitcase and spruce it up a bit. Then you will need to check in at the airport. You will even have to pull extra items out of your suitcase! Finally, work on the appearance of the character, choosing clothes, shoes, hair.
